am_devices_dc_dbi_novatek.c File Reference

Driver for Novatek display panels with DBI interface (NT35510). More...

Detailed Description

Driver for Novatek display panels with DBI interface (NT35510).

#include "am_devices_dc_dbi_novatek.h"
#include "am_util_delay.h"
#include "am_bsp.h"
#include "am_util.h"
#include "nema_math.h"
